location: Jilin Road, Zhongshan District - 490m from Songjiang Nanjing MRT, Fangcheng City A complex
notes: Well-maintained 3BR apartment in modern elevator building, move-in ready with full furnishings. Good natural light expected with balcony access. For baby safety, verify balcony railing height and gaps; the separate shower/tub bathroom is convenient but check for slip hazards. Building is 3+ years old with mid-range finishes - appears clean and suitable for family living.
